Activity: Log in and check emails. Prepare for the meeting with Leon and Naomi.
Review the current state of the UI elements: menus, HUD, settings panels, error messages, and tutorials. Make notes on areas for improvement based on previous testing.

Meeting with @NarrativeDesigner Leon and @UIUX-1 Naomi to discuss the UI's reflection of the game's world and narrative. Get feedback on the art style, text, and overall tone of the UI. Prepare specific questions regarding integration of narrative elements within the UI.
Lunch break. Discuss the meeting results with the team members.

Based on feedback from Leon and Naomi, start implementing changes to the UI. Focus on adjusting the art style, text, and overall tone to better reflect the game's world and narrative. Start with small adjustments and iterate based on feedback.

Refactor the code for the UI elements to be more modular and maintainable. Use a consistent coding style and add comments to improve readability. Write down technical documentation and design considerations.
Test the updated UI elements. Ensure that the changes have not introduced any new bugs or performance issues. Ask the Qtest member for help if necessary.
Commit changes to Git. Provide detailed commit messages.
